line.token: * This file is part of the Symfony package.
* For the full copyright and license information, please view the LICENSE
* file that was distributed with this source code.
* ChoiceFormField represents a choice form field.
* It is constructed from a HTML select tag, or a HTML checkbox, or radio inputs.
* Returns true if the field should be included in the submitted values.
* @return bool true if the field should be included in the submitted values, false otherwise
// don't send a value for unchecked checkboxes
* Check if the current selected option is disabled.
* Sets the value of the field.
* @param string $value The value of the field
* @throws \LogicException When the type provided is not correct
'You cannot tick "%s" as it is not a checkbox (%s).'
* @throws \LogicException When the type provided is not correct
'You cannot tick "%s" as it is not a checkbox (%s).'
* Sets the value of the field.
* @param string $value The value of the field
* @throws \InvalidArgumentException When value type provided is not correct
'The value for "%s" cannot be an array.'
'Input "%s" cannot take "%s" as a value (possible values: %s).'
'Input "%s" cannot take "%s" as a value (possible values: %s).'
* Adds a choice to the current ones.
* This method should only be used internally.
* @throws \LogicException When choice provided is not multiple nor radio
'Unable to add a choice for "%s" as it is not multiple or is not a radio button.'
* Returns the type of the choice field (radio, select, or checkbox).
* Returns true if the field accepts multiple values.
* @return bool true if the field accepts multiple values, false otherwise
'A ChoiceFormField can only be created from an input or select tag (%s given).'
'A ChoiceFormField can only be created from an input tag with a type of checkbox or radio (given type is %s).'
// if no option is selected and if it is a simple select box, take the first option as the value
* Returns option value with associated disabled flag.
* Checks whether given value is in the existing options.
* Returns list of available field options.
* Disables the internal validation of the field.
